name: Trench Shotgun
description: The Trench Shotgun is aTier 4variant of theShotgunthat packs a punch and currently is the highest damage dealing close-range weapon available. It uses any type ofShotgun Ammunition. With the highest ammo capacity and projectile damage amongst all three Shotguns, the Trench Shotgun is a go-to for the Shotgun enthusiast in the group. The Trench Shotgun can fire 100 rounds before breaking, and the talentGunsmithcan increase this to up to a maximum of 125 rounds, so bring aFabricatorfor long trips.
